attributes.action: Immediately halt all bonuses paid to all banking staff in the current financial year
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Bonuses, by definition, should be for performance above a certain, pre-determined, level; clearly, this is (and has not been) not the case in the banking sector. We, the taxpayer, via HMG, now own substantial parts of several UK banks, into which we have ploughed billions of pounds. Now, we see billions more of our money being paid to the very people who got us into the current financial mess, at a time when tens of thousands of people are losing their jobs and facing severe cutbacks in their household budgets. Is this fair?

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
